Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [Jun 11, 2019] - The Abyss to Release Encased, a Sci-fi Post-Apocalyptic RPG    Another crazy game is coming to The Abyss, so please welcome! We reached an agreement with Black Tower Entertainment, a popular video games publisher, and their first game to be released on The Abyss will be Encased a Sci-fi Post-Apocalyptic RPG. The first playable version of the game will appear on our platform this year, while various game editions already available for pre-order.  Developed by Dark Crystal Games studio, Encased is an isometric role-playing game in a sci-fi post-apocalyptic setting. It was inspired by the first two Fallout instalments, Divinity: Original Sin, Baldur’s Gate, Pillars of Eternity and alike.  Read more at: https://theabyss.link/encased-ann

Body: [Dec 20, 2018] - BOSSGARD is Coming to The Abyss    Hi all! Good news travel fast. Today, we're pleased to  announce another partnership. We’re teaming up with Sand Sailor Studio to release BOSSGARD fight-the-boss online multiplayer on The Abyss.  The game will be released in Q1 2019, and will appear on the platform after the launch.   Read more at: https://theabyss.link/bossgard1

Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [Dec 26, 2018] - Blazing Core, a Multiplayer Shooter, Will Hit The Abyss    Hi, all! The Abyss is excited with its new partnership announcement. This time, we’re signing up with Octobox Interactive studio and will be releasing Blazing Core - a multiplayer team-centric tactical shooter with mech knight battles.  Powered by Unreal Engine 4, Blazing Core, which is already in early access, will arrive at The Abyss after the launch of the platform, in Q1 2019.  Read more at https://theabyss.link/blazingcore1

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [Dec 31, 2018] - End Titles For 2018: Key Highlights    Hi all! The year 2018 is close to an end. It was an exciting and extremely productive year, with its highs and lows, challenges and victories. With the support from our partners and community, The Abyss Team have executed a successful crowdfunding campaign and achieved lots of astonishing results.  Let us recall the most memorable moments of the 2018 season together: https://theabyss.link/highlights2018

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [Jan 14, 2019] - BattleRush 2 will Arrive to The Abyss    The Abyss announces signing up with Thunder Devs, to bring BattleRush 2 action MMO FPS to the platform.  Released in Oct 2018, BattleRush 2 is a large open-world shooter with a dark & realistic WWII entourage with craft and total destructibility of the environment. The game will be released on The Abyss after the launch of the platform.  Read more at: https://theabyss.link/battlerush2

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [Jan 15, 2019] - ABYSS Token Listed On Kyber Network    The Abyss is glad to announce that ABYSS is now listed on Kyber Nework on-chain liquidity protocol. This is the next milestone for our project bringing more liquidity for our token, which is already accessible through Kyber Swap and other platforms.  Read more at https://theabyss.link/kybernetwork1

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [Jan 21, 2019] - ABYSS Token Listed on ZBG (sub-brand of ZB.com)    Dear all! We are excited to announce another listing for The Abyss. On Jan 22, 2019, trading will start on ZBG.  ZBG.com is a Hong Kong based crypto exchange and a sub-brand of the much larger exchange - ZB.com. It is an innovative version of ZB, which is an international crypto exchange now ranked top 7 on CoinMarketCap by adjusted volume (as of Jan 21, 2019).  Read more at: https://theabyss.link/zbg1

Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [Feb 25, 2019] - ABYSS Token Integrated with Blockchain Cuties    Dear all! Exciting things are happening! Today, we are pleased to inform that Blockchain Cuties, an adorable, award-winning multi-blockchain crypto game, has integrated our token with its protocol. Cuties are available for purchase using the ABYSS tokens now! Our congrats to all crypto collectors!  Read more at: https://theabyss.link/cuties1

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [Feb 27, 2019] - Cooperation with INLINGO Game Localization Studio    Hello all! Today, we’re excited to announce our cooperation with INLINGO, a game localization studio, aimed to support game developers on The Abyss. INLINGO adapts various game projects, making them attractive and easy-to-understand for players around the globe. The studio’s portfolio includes over 42 language pairs and 434 localized games.  Through our cooperation with INLINGO game developers will enjoy special localization conditions for certain language pairs.  Read more at: https://theabyss.link/inlingo1

Body: Tthe current community listing round will close at UTC 17.00. The top 3 tokens will become available for trading later in the week on Ethfinex and Bitfinex. You can view the process at nectar.community.  Please ensure that you have used any EVT held before that time to help decide which new tokens should be added to the platform. All unused voting tokens will be lost, and disappear, when voting finishes. If you are holding your EVT on Ethfinex there is a possibility of experiencing withdrawal delays, so please leave plenty of time to withdraw your tokens and vote before the end of the period.  The market on Ethfinex for EVT will close at UTC 14.00, exactly three hours prior to the close of the community token vote.

Author: lookuper
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Why is special about and why it should be list The global video game market is dominated by a few major players, like Steam, GOG, Kongregate, etc., that have enough power to dictate and impose their conditions to gamers and developers. The Abyss is the next generation game platform that offers multiple services, that will help game developers to reduce their marketing costs and to deliver their products to the mass users with lesser time and financial resources spent. And what is extremely important, it also offers lots of opportunities to earn money while playing or creating video games. Our multilevel referral program will revolutionize the entire industry. Additionally, The Abyss allows to enjoy all the benefits of blockchain and cryptocurrency, that will remain the major economic trends in for many years to come. I think this is the best answer for voting from president of the abyss

Author: Tim2412
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Availability of funds for May and June allowed for successful start of The Abyss platform development, creation of team and promotion, as well as for the arrangement of exchange listings and partnerships.Expanding of the development team allowed us to deliver all milestones planned for Q2 and to get the pre-alpha version of the platform ready for launch already on July 19. However, the development team is not complete yet and recruitment of the best talents is still in process. Introduction of pre-alpha version of The Abyss will allow for creating of even more in-depth user experience and will encourage developers to place their games on the platform. I  think this is a good argument to hold our tokens.

Read more at: https://theabyss.link/devnews3

Author: sufcrop11
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [June 11, 2018] - Announcing the Prototype Major Update The Abyss Team has had such a busy n’ wild month, . On June 12, the renewed platform’s prototype will be officially released. It will feature the demo game and will have an integrated billing system, allowing to pay for in-game purchases with ABYSS tokens.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [June 12, 2018] - The Prototype 2.0: Major Update Release    The Abyss Team has spent the most busy, still wonderful, time working on the The Abyss prototype updates, and was worth it. Proudly presenting the current version, featuring lots of new specials and additions, and two killer features. These are the possibility to play the popular browser demo game (with a multimillion audience worldwide) and the integration of a billing system, allowing for simple and quick payments in ABYSS tokens with an extra 25% off the in-game purchases.  The prototype’s major update is officially released and now available both for Web and Desktop applications.  Read more at: https://theabyss.link/prototype2

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [June 10, 2018] - The First Tap Poll: DAICO in Action    The Abyss digital distribution platform is heading to its first poll for a tap increase, opening at Etherscan on June 10th, 0:00 UTC, and closing in 72 hours.  The goal that we’re setting for the upcoming poll is increasing the tap from 500 to 750 ETH. The poll is to become the best illustration of DAICO in action, driven by the principles of democracy and transparency.  The tap poll results will be available online, and you will be able to check it any time at the official DAICO landing page. Advanced users can also verify the results on Etherscan.  Read more about the first tap poll and our plans at https://theabyss.link/tappolI1

Author: remodex9
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: The Abyss is a next-generation digital distribution platform, delivering all types of video games (Free2play MMOs and cryptogames being a key priority), including AAA-titles, to the fast-growing global game community. Unlike other platforms (Steam, Origin, GOG, etc.), The Abyss offers a groundbreaking motivational and multilevel referral system, allowing gamers to earn from in-game and social activities, and other gamers’ payments as well. By joining The Abyss, developers will reduce their marketing expenses and receive an extra income from referral payments made in other games on the platform.

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Bitcoin Garden: The Abyss – the First Implemented DAICO – Tokens Available for Purchase on the Exchanges as of June 7, 2018 https://bitcoingarden.org/the-abyss-the-first-implemented-daico-tokens-available-for-purchase-on-the-exchanges-as-of-june-7-2018/  The Abyss is a blockchain powered digital distribution platform created to shake up game industry by offering gamers and developers multiple opportunities to increase their profits and to break the market monopoly. The Abyss brings a new era of blockchain revolution to the video game industry and creates a fair system for games distribution.  In April 2018, The Abyss has become the world’s first project to implement the DAICO concept, an innovative fundraising model combining the benefits of DAO’s and traditional ICOs inspired by Vitalik Buterin, raising more than 15M USD.    As of June 7, 2018, platform specific ABYSS tokens are available for purchase on 9 exchange services with confirmed listings. The ABYSS tokens can be purchased on HitBTC, Coinbene, Bitforex, Yobit, IDEX, DDEX, EtherDelta, Bilaxy and Mexc. As part of joint The Abyss-HitBTC promotional campaign, during the first 2 weeks, buying/selling ABYSS tokens will be free of charge on HitBTC. Until June 22, there will be no trading fees on Coinbene as well.  The start time of the trading process will vary depending on each of the exchange time schedule. The company continues negotiating more listing of ABYSS tokens....

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [June 5, 2018] - The Abyss Announces Partnership with Changelly    The Abyss partners with Changelly, an instant cryptocurrency exchange service providing the fiat-to-crypto and crypto-to-crypto options.  After Changelly’s integration to the platform, gamers will be able to buy ABYSS tokens for USD/EURO using a bank (credit/debit) card without leaving The Abyss. Changelly also supports crypto-to-crypto transactions, allowing gamers and developers to convert ABYSS tokens to Bitcoin and other popular cryptocurrencies, including stable USDT (Tether) cryptocurrency.  Read more at https://theabyss.link/changelly

Author: Jekwizor
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: The Abyss Announces Partnership with Changelly https://medium.com/theabyss/the-abyss-announces-partnership-with-changelly-2f65715e5e7f    The Abyss, the next generation digital distribution platform, officially announces partnership with Changelly, an instant cryptocurrency exchange service providing the fiat-to-crypto and crypto-to-crypto options.  Partnership with Changelly follows the strategy of The Abyss to deliver the most convenient and accessible service to its customers. After Changelly’s integration to The Abyss platform, gamers will be able to buy ABYSS tokens for USD/EURO using a bank (credit/debit) card without leaving The Abyss.  Changelly also supports crypto-to-crypto transactions, allowing gamers and developers to convert ABYSS tokens to Bitcoin and other popular cryptocurrencies, including stable USDT (Tether) cryptocurrency. The service picks up the best rate from various exchanges.  The Abyss is excited to provide this smart and easy-to-use service to its customers. For many of them the integration of Changelly tools would be one of the quickest ways to step into the cryptoworld. Those who have never in their lives interacted with cryptocurrencies, will have the best and the easiest crypto experience.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [May 31, 2018] - The Abyss Confirms Listing on HitBTC    We are proud to tell you that The Abyss has signed with and will be listed on HitBTC exchange on June 7, 2018. It means that ABYSS tokens will be available for purchase within a week already. As part of the joint promotional campaign, during the first two weeks tokens will be trading with no fees charged.  HitBTC is currently ranked the #7 exchange in terms of 24 Hour Volume Rankings by CoinMarketCap. Trading process will start on June 7, 2018 (Eastern Pacific Time). From this date, you can deposit and withdraw ABYSS tokens to/from the HitBTC exchange.  Read more: https://theabyss.link/hitbtc

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [May 4, 2018] - The Abyss DAICO Voting System Explainer    One of the core elements of The Abyss fundraising model (DAICO) is the voting system, which is 100% controlled by the smart contract. It is through a voting system that the team can raise its monthly budget (the tap). It also allows token holders to start a refund poll in case the team fails to implement the project.  With our new blog post on Medium, we are delivering a step-by-step instruction on how to vote for tap increase and refund, and how to create the refund poll using Etherscan and MyEtherWallet: https://theabyss.link/voting-system

Author: alexvilis
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: DAICO Starts On April 18, 2018 (14:00 UTC)  https://medium.com/theabyss/daico-starts-on-april-18-2018-14-00-utc-fd14fd0de618  Shortly before the planned Token Sale start time (on April 16, 2018) we have discovered a mistake in setting the ABYSS token rate. We closed the website immediately to prevent users from purchasing tokens. Unfortunately, some of the transactions have already been sent directly to the smart contract.  As of now, The Abyss engineering team has fixed all the technical issues, that led to this situation. Fixed bugs uploaded on Github for your consideration. The new smart contract will be re-deployed and new address will be available in your dashboard.  We really do apologize that we failed to timely prevent funds from being sent to the smart contract. We are unable to process the sent transactions properly. However, you will be provided an opportunity to participate in the Token Sale (DAICO) either with funds you already sent or with a new pledge. Besides, all participants that have sent transactions on April 16, 2018, can get the entire refund (commission for transaction not included). Check this instruction to get more info on how to get refund.  The day before the planned Token Sale (April, 16), we published the smart contract address so that you could research its code. Not for sending funds. All contributions should pass through the users dashboard only. For this reason, if you send transaction directly to smart contract address without using dashboard instructions you will not have an opportunity to receive a 3% bonus for your first contribution.  We regret this situation, and will never let it recur.  We’ll be waiting for you at the Token Sale (DAICO), that starts on April 18, 2018, at 14:00 UTC and ends on May 16, 2018, same time. The count down time for bonuses will start together with the Token Sale.  https://medium.com/theabyss/daico-starts-on-april-18-2018-14-00-utc-fd14fd0de618

Body: [Apr 20, 2018] - The Abyss To Be Supported by Xsolla    Excited to announce today that Aleksandr Agapitov, CEO of Xsolla, will be joining the project as a Product Advisor. As a successful tech entrepreneur with an extensive background in the video game industry and experience in digital marketing, he is a perfect fit to advise The Abyss team in building its next-generation digital distribution game platform.  Xsolla’s technical solutions will create a bridge between their 2000+ game projects and The Abyss, giving quick and easy access to the platform. Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [Apr 12, 2018] - World’s First DAICO to be Conducted on Malta    Malta is now positioning itself as a leading blockchain technology hub and cryptocurrency front-runner, with many government initiatives currently underway.  Today, it is far more progressive, than any other country, when it comes to crypto and fintech, implementing the state-approved National Blockchain Strategy, building a legal ground for certifying blockchain-based companies and conducting ICOs.  The Abyss LTD is now incorporated in Birkirkara BKR 9037, Malta. Moving from Switzerland to Malta will allow us to intelligently optimize operating expenses and ensure the launch and a long-term operation of the platform within a clear and smooth legal framework, under more favorable economic conditions.  Hello, Malta!  Read more at: https://theabyss.link/malta

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [April 5, 2018] - Hard Cap Reduced & Other Important Updates    Announcing the important changes related to the project’s Hard Cap. Based on the current market realities, more specifically, the drop of Ethereum rate, we are decreasing it from 60M USD to 18M USD, with the additional BNB Hard Cap (accounting for 300 000 BNB) remaining unchanged.  We understand, that the change of the ETH rate and market instability have resulted in contributors’ significant financial losses, and we are reducing the Hard Cap to somehow accommodate them.  Other important updates that followed the Hard Cap reduction are available in our latest Medium blog post: https://theabyss.link/2q4DeLq

Over two months of hard working have resulted in adding new features, aimed at conducting even safer and more transparent DAICO, and removing some of the features that appeared ineffective.   The project’s concept has evolved. While being its technical implementation, the smart contract has evolved respectively. We’re now presenting a guide to the renewed DAICO smart contract for your careful examination and consideration.  All details and code examples are available in our latest blog post on Medium (Best viewed on PC): https://theabyss.link/daico-guide

Vladimir Kurochkin, the president, will be reporting at the event, delivering a keynote speech, and will discuss the platform’s key features and negotiate business opportunities with the attendees.  http://bit.ly/2J485iV  #Blockchain #Ethereum #ICO #DAICO

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [Mar 30, 2018] - Stepping Away From The Oracles Concept    We really loved the Oracles idea, but couldn’t find a universal way to prove they would be and would act 100% independently. Despite all our efforts, we’re still hearing doubts and see a disbelief. We understand it though, and we respect our community members’ opinion.  This is why we got back to Vitalik Buterin’s original DAICO concept. We’re now removing the Oracles, providing each token holder the right to participate in the refund poll directly, without third parties.  Further improvements to the DAICO model, that we introduce, will make it even more legally compliant, and at the same time will increase its transparency for the token holders.  We explain all this in more detail at: https://theabyss.link/2J6eNVR

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: [Mar 20, 2018] - The Abyss Will Be a Platinum Sponsor at the DevGAMM Conference  The Abyss is proud to be a Platinum Sponsor at the DevGAMM event 2018, one of the biggest conferences for game industry professionals in Europe. It will take place on May 17-18 in Moscow.  DevGAMM (previously FlashGAMM) was founded in 2008. In 9 years the event has grown from local 100-person meet up to one of the leading professional events in game industry reaching over 3000 attendees from more than 30 countries. DevGAMM offers quality content about game development, low entry threshold for beginner developers as well as a series of activities meant for productive pastime and effective networking.  The Abyss will be reviewing new perspective games for the platform, and we will be glad to share with you our vision and experience in the video game industry as well.  Come and meet us: http://devgamm.com

Author: Partnerra
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Cool review on ICO Crunch:  🕹The Abyss – https://icocrunch.io/ico/the-abyss/ What – Digital gaming distribution platform providing benefits for gamers and developers When – TBD Rating – 4.5🔥  Idea & Token For the last years, the gaming industry has become a huge market reaching $100 billion revenue in 2017. One of the key factors of this growth is a digital distribution of games without the use of physical media like CDs. This way of distribution has led to appearing such publishers and retailers as Steam, PlayStation Store, Amazon.com, Origin, UPlay, and others. The Abyss aiming to become the gaming distribution platform offering the following unique benefits for gamers and developers: – Multilevel referral: The Abyss offers individual referral programs to players and pays for friends engaged to the platform and users engaged by the friends. And if you are the first to bring in users to the platform, you earn the maximum income. This works for both players and developers. – Earnings for gamers: Gamers can also earn from different activities on the platform, such as achievements, content generation (reviews, streams, guides, commentary, fan art), internal CPA Network, etc. – Internal CPA (Cost Per Action) Network for developers: Developers get access to an internal system of advertising offers for engaging targeted traffic. Add here some promotion features, such as offering one’s traffic to other games for tokens, getting external traffic, viewing traffic statistics, link referral etc. The Abyss also offers customer support service, simple UI, ability to launch the alpha or beta versions for collecting gamers’ feedback, and others. The release of the first version of the platform is planned on Q4 2018, and the development will continue in 2019 and 2020. Their ERC-20 token called ABYSS is the primary way of exchange on the platform. Fiat will also be accepted for game purchases for faster adoption, but if you buy with ABYSS tokens, you get a discount. Some features will be accessible by using the ABYSS tokens only.  Team The Abyss is a project of Destiny.Games, well-known Russia-based video game developer and publisher with extensive expertise in developing game projects. Founder Konstantin Boyko-Romanovsky, also the Founder and CEO of Destiny.Games, has over 17 years of experience in the gaming industry. The core team consists of 12 members (the entire team of Destiny.Games consists of 40+ specialists), plus 5 advisors. The team is really strong and looks more than capable of developing the projects of that kind.  Summary In addition to most of the features of existing competitors like Steam or Origin, the Abyss platform offers their own unique ones, that makes the project quite attractive, but they’ve got the significant hype due to a decision to test the DAICO concept developed by Vitalik Butrin. This concept allows token holders to control the fund withdrawal limit, and vote for the refund of the remaining contributed money in case the team fails to implement the project. Among possible challenges we’d call the platform implementation which is planned only for Q4 2018 and more than serious competitors like Steam. At the same time, their five-level referral program is working right now and will definitely drive adoption in the beginning of the project life.  The Abyss is an ambitious project which is being developed by an excellent, fully-packed, experienced team aiming to bring a new generation gaming distribution platform with unique benefits for both gamers and developers. And they are trying to be better than Steam. Well, let’s see.

Author: TOM47
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Overcoming New Challenges    Dear friends, the KYC/AML procedure proved another challenge we had to encounter and overcome.  The KYC contractor’s solution has been unable to process all submitted requests correctly and timely, which has resulted in receiving numerous problem reports. For this reason, we stopped cooperation with our current KYC provider, and are in process of signing up with a new partner who’s utilizing another technology.  A proper KYC/AML procedure is critical to ensuring transparent and legally compliant token sale. The Abyss DAICO will comply with the Reg D under U.S. legislation, and we are obliged by law to conduct KYC/AML for all contributors (not just for those who pay over some amount). It must be launched before the crowdsale to secure (apart from other issues) that all identified contributors’ wallets are added to the smart contract and to avoid transactions sent from unauthorized wallets. Besides, according to our DAICO model, KYC/AML can not be completed after the end of crowdsale.  Till the end of the week we will provide detailed step by step instructions on how to pass the procedure, which is even more simple and requires no additional apps to be installed. The start-end date of The Abyss DAICO is also to be announced soon. We regret it is taking more time than we have expected, but all processes should be running properly and with maximum comfort.  We do everything to provide a better and safer user experience, and are grateful to all our supporters for understanding our concerns!  https://medium.com/theabyss/overcoming-new-challenges-acc2f86f87a1

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Bitcoin Garden: The Abyss DAICO, Remodeling The Token Sale https://bitcoingarden.org/the-abyss-daico-remodeling-the-token-sale/  ICO contributors, though are willing to take risk, are looking for a more controlled risk system. Considering this, The Abyss, the next-generation digital distribution platform, recognized the dire need to remodel Token Sale to bring about significant increase in token holder’s trust.  Earlier this year, Vitalik Buterin (co-founder of Ethereum) opined that ICO be upgraded by merging part of the benefits of Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs). This new idea, DAICO, is an innovative fundraising model geared towards ensuring that ICOs are more secure with the introduction of poll system and the involvement of project’s token holders into the voting process.  In the line with this development, The Abyss is declaring to the general public the intention to launch DAICO which is a reinforced version of ICO merged with aspects of DAO.  DAICO brings worthy solutions to always changing security needs as well as ensuring transparency at the very heart of innovation....

Author: MihailJ
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Already There, A Few Things Left To Do https://medium.com/theabyss/already-there-a-few-things-left-to-do-7707518dbc6a  We have always tried to show everyone interested in our project, that we care about their comfort, and consider ensuring the security of payments, together with protection from all types of cyber attacks, our key priority.  On March 3, we’ve reached a new level: 100 000 participants registered. We appreciate the trust of those who are ready to support the project and will do our best to ensure that as many of them as possible will participate in the Token Sale (DAICO). This is exactly what distinguishes us from other projects that cancelled Token Sales at the last moment and used to conduct pre-sales or/and closed sales for selected participants. In order to achieve the said goal, we are being kept really busy improving our system’s performance, so that it is able to process all the requests.  Upon the recommendations from Mikko Ohtamaa, our technical advisor, we postpone the KYC / AML procedure for several days in order to test its safety. Our partners from Netki (our KYC / AML provider) are integrating the mobile app MyVerify, that will help to submit all necessary documents in less than 5 minutes.  Also we plan to make additional security tests and improvements as recommended by Mikko.  Security never hurts. Since it is DAICO, the smart contract security is specially welcomed. That’s why we’ll have minimum three smart contract audits done.

Author: sudhakark
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Now we are in the digital era, where you can see there is no lack of game options. It may be played on a personal computer, video game, console, mobile phone, tablet or even a watch; you can play video games at any time. Developers are facing many problems in creating interest products. It is difficult to find to make the products masses of other video game options and reaches to the end users. Half of the budget is going to the advertisements of the video game development. As the cost is more for advertising developers so they won’t show interest in doing the quality video games. As the price of the product advertising expenses is really effective then it may cause the fault in making the video games by the developer. Blockchain technology helps you to create next-generation then it easy to deliver all the types of video games. The Abyss developers reduce their marketing expenses and they will receive extra income by referring other games. You can get extra profits from automatic payments to cryptocurrency accounts. So here developers need to afford more money in advertising now they can easily develop quality video games and can earn money by referring games.

Author: olegna17
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Once you refer your friend to Abyss you will earn a reward from it, that is a direct referral. The indirect referral is the reward you will earn if the one you refer will also refer a friend to Abyss. To cut it short, direct referral is the one you directly refer to Abyss and the indirect referral is your down line referral of your friend (the one who refer you directly to join Abyss). Hope this will help you understand.

Author: Justenjoy1903
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: The Abyss has new mechanism called DAICO which further strengthen the existing system while maintaining flexibility, transparency and security. It offers the follwing:  * minimize the risk of fraud, specifies contribution and resolution rules * allow refunds and raised funds withdrawal controlled by contributors * Improved voting system with Oracles acting as arbitrators that will cover the Project closure and funds withdrawal * Oracles also would have the right to hold polls for the project’s shut down, leading to the remaining funds returned to contributors * Only project’s contributors will be granted a voting right  If you want to file an application for Oracle but make sure you're  from industry professionals, with an established reputation in the relevant field, here's the link: daico@theabyss.com

Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: 10 Reasons To Fall In Love With Switzerland    First. The most prominent and reliable banking system (also famous for its privacy policy). Second. The world’s best milk chocolate (if you disagree, then you haven’t tasted it). Third. Delicious Swiss cheese (>450 varieties). Fourth. The most precise watches (dominating the watchmaking industry). Fifth. Swiss Alps (and ski resorts). Sixth. Lakes (Lake Geneva, Lake Zurich, Lake Neuchatel. Many of them). Seventh. Music festivals (ranging from Classical to rock). Eighth. Zurich (one the most desirable cities in the world is the pride of Switzerland). Ninth. Ecology (fewer harmful emissions, no incineration plants, etc.). Tenth, and the most significant. The Abyss Token Sale (DAICO).  We decided it would be the best option in all respects. Swirtzerland is now moving towards building the world’s leading blockchain and cryptographic ecosystem, fostering the development of pioneering digital technologies.  Therefore, on January 18, 2018, we incorporated The Abyss GmbH in Gartenstrasse 4, 6300 Zug — a legal body to conduct Token Sale (DAICO) — in Switzerland. Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: The Abyss Token Sale (DAICO) will be officially launched in the U.S., providing its citizens and residents a right to participate.    We are committed to staying compliant with the current regulations governing the issuance of new tokens.  Upon advice of our attorneys, we decided to proceed with the sale in the U.S. to accredited investors only under Regulation D of the Securities Act of 1933 and to non-U.S. persons under Regulation S. The tokens sold under Regulation D will carry transfer restrictions in accordance with regulations.  This means that each U.S. contributor participating in The Abyss Token Sale (DAICO) will need to pass the accredited investor verification process (KYC) as required by the U.S. law.  This will make our Token Sale (DAICO) globally available, with no regional restrictions anymore.    Will keep you informed on the issue via our Telegram channels and social media!  Stay tuned!

He started his first business at the age of 19, sold it 6 years later and started a life of a digital nomad. In 2017 Tony started specialising in token launches by developing and executing marketing strategies. His efforts helped his clients, including KickICO, Gameflip and BnkToTheFuture, sell more than $40,000,000 of tokens.  https://medium.com/theabyss/token-sale-advisor-announcement-tony-simonovsky-2f7bbcf8a1a5

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Watch this short business video, where the project’s key people speak about The Abyss digital distribution platform, its idea and core features, functional advantages and plans to compete with Steam.  The video is a here.  Konstantin Boyko-Romanovsky, Founder “Basically, there is only one digital distribution platform on the market cumulating the entire gamer community. …We all know its name. Yes, still it’s difficult to challenge Steam. But this is exactly what we do”.  Vladimir Kurochkin, President “To attract users to the platform, we implement our own 5-level referral program. It’s simple — you receive a share of tokens your friends spend in various games. As well as the share of payments friends of your friends make. And so on, 5 referral levels down”.  Artem Veremeenko, Executive Producer “Our main goal is to create a portal to the cryptoworld for a 2 billion gamer audience”.  Subscribe to The Abyss official Youtube, speak your mind in our Telegram and Discord channels.  Like! Share!

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Due to uncertain regulatory climate in the US, we initially planned to completely exclude US residents from participating in The Abyss Token Sale (DAICO). But we did not give up our attempts to find a way to include US residents in our DAICO within the bounds of US law and regulations.  Today, we are glad to announce that Max Dilendorf and Rika Kurdayan, the founders of Dilendorf Khurdayan, a New York City-based law firm, officially joined The Abyss as the US Legal Advisors.  Max’s practice involves real estate, blockchain, virtual currencies and ICOs. He advised local and international blockchain startups and developers with launching ICO projects in the U.S., including blockchain real estate development and management platform, cross-blockchain crypto trading platform, B2B blockchain-based freelance platform and many others. Max handles legal and SEC regulatory aspects of the blockchain industry, including rules applicable to token generating events and crypto fund formations.  Rika’s practice involves international private client work, blockchain, virtual currencies and ICOs. She focuses on legal and regulatory aspects of blockchain and distributed ledger technology, particularly, securities and futures regulations applicable to token generating events and cryptocurrency. Rika advises a variety of clients, including private equity and venture capital funds, private companies and family offices, blockchain start-ups and experienced developers. She helps these clients navigate the multiple securities laws, tax laws, property regimes and legal systems as they move people, financial assets and business interests across international borders.  We are confident that Max’ and Rika’s skills and experience in law and regulatory field will be a valuable asset to our project.  Welcome onboard!

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: DAICO is an innovative fundraising model (suggested by the founder of Ethereum, Vitalik Buterin) that merges some of the benefits of Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs), aimed at upgrading and making the initial ICO concept more transparent and secure. The Abyss Token Sale is an advanced and improved DAICO model, allowing contributors to control the withdrawal of the funds, also providing an option to shut the project down and refund the contributed money in case the team fails to implement it, with Oracles (appointed industry leaders) acting as arbitrators. More information here: https://medium.com/theabyss/the-worlds-first-daico-remodeling-the-token-sale-df3b56a8df9e

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Unfortunately right now it is impossible to make own game store in appstore, so our app on iOS will contain chat and other social features. About Google Play it is possible to make store there, but we have it in plans only after pc market is dominated.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Our platform will be available in all countries, but our Token Sale is not available for several countries right now.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: We don't need partnerships with game platforms because we are their direct competitors. We need partnerships with developers and Q2-Q3 2018 will be spent also on "Partnership agreements with game projects" according to our roadmap presented here: https://www.theabyss.com/#Roadmap

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: If you register, you automatically become member and can start earning rewards. No need of additional membership.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: The Abyss is a next generation digital distribution platform, delivering all types of video games (Free2play MMOs and cryptogames being a key priority), including AAA-titles, to the fast-growing global game community. So not only MMOs.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: If you are a game developer you just publish your game on our platform (Same as on Steam) and start getting new players for your game. If your game was first on the platform for them, they will become your lifetime referrals and you will receive income from their payments even if they leave for another game on the platform.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Please visit this page: https://www.theabyss.com/referral-program  Also we will upload video with explaining referral system soon on our youtube channel.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Hi. Yes DAICO will support only ETH. We removed BTC from our supported currency on Token Sale.  Now it will be started on February 7, 2018.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: The Abyss is a next generation digital distribution platform, delivering all types of video games (Free2play MMOs and cryptogames being a key priority), including AAA-titles, to the fast-growing global game community. Unlike other platforms (Steam, Origin, GOG, etc.), The Abyss offers a groundbreaking motivational and multilevel referral system, allowing gamers to earn from in-game and social activities, and other gamers’ payments as well.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Are you speaking about mobile games or PC games. Can you show us example please.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Hi.  1st referral level - 4%* from payment 2nd referral level - 2%* from payment 3rd referral level - 2%* from payment 4th referral level - 1%* from payment 5th referral level - 1%* from payment  * VAT and payment charges of payment services are not included

Author: OhBow0709
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: I think the "how it works?" section on this link will help you understand it: https://www.theabyss.com/referral-program The Abyss in my opinion is actually one of the promising future platforms in history of gaming because it allows users to earn while enjoying their preferred game by just inviting their friends or participating on their motivational programs.  For the referral system, see the example scenarios below:  1st level referral contribution (4%) Scenario: Unplugged invited me to join Abyss and I spent $250 to it then, Unplugged will receive 4% of it in a form of token which is equivalent to $10.  2nd and 3rd level referral contribution(2%) Scenario: After I joined the platform, I was able to convinced my girlfriend and she invited her brother as well to be part of it and they have decided to pay $500 on each of their accounts.  The total referral bonus Unplugged, me and my girlfriend will receive is:  Unplugged: $10 + $10 +$5 = $25 worth of token OhBow0709: $20 + $10 = $30 worth of token MyGirlfriend: $20 worth of token  4th - 5th ... level referral contribution (1%) Scenario: After several days, my girlfriend's brother invited his roommate (a heavy gamer) to a game he's playing under Abyss platform and his roommate spend $1000.  The total referral bonus Unplugged, me, my girlfriend and her brother will receive is:  Unplugged: $10 + $10 +$5 + $10 = $35 worth of token OhBow0709: $20 + $10 + $20 = $50 worth of token MyGirlfriend: $20 + $20 = $40 worth of token MyGirlfriend'sBro: $40 worth of token  I hope my explanation helps.

Author: Rhona Ponse De Leon
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: I'm happy with this project because we can see that it's easy to take steps to get a share of the Abyss earnings. It's easy because they have step 1-4 to get your token by sharing your referral links, Yes! Only by sharing we can earn token from this project. No difficulty and less hassle, We need to do is to follow their step.  Get Tokens By Sharing  1.Step 1: Log in to your The Abyss account 2.Step 2: Obtain your referral link 3.Step 3: Share your referral link at any online space where you think potential investors are present — be active and creative! 4.Step 4: Earn referral rewards whenever someone clicks on your referral link and make a contribution. Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: i don’t think we should compare anything with the ICO that removed all info about the token sale after it had been finished. Especially after the DAICOs started to appear.  About us. The Abyss is a next generation digital distribution platform, delivering all types of video games (Free2play MMOs and cryptogames being a key priority), including AAA-titles, to the fast-growing global game community. Unlike other platforms (Steam, Origin, GOG, etc.), The Abyss offers a groundbreaking motivational and multilevel referral system, allowing gamers to earn from in-game and social activities, and other gamers’ payments as well. By joining The Abyss, developers will reduce their marketing expenses and receive an extra income from referral payments made in other games on the platform.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: You've made a great point here. The Abyss is not just a coin, a token, or an app. It is a complex and complete ecosystem for all people involved in Game industry.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: This would be decided by each game themselves. You see, games have different goals to achieve. For example, a big RPG may want you to discover the hidden achievements, so you can share them with the community later, and make some fun and competition of it for all who play it. The F2P MMORPG may want you to queue for PVP activities more often etc. But generally every game will motivate you to do the things they are most intrested in.  It could also simplify the massive testing process. it would be very easy for a game to focus players on specific content with The Abyss mechanics.  Besides, you can build referral network to earn tokens for payments of your friends.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: It can be described in a very simple way: - You can use The Abyss as a Game platform. Like any other. Buy games, play games, discuss games, etc - You invite your friends as your referals - They do the same: play, buy, talk - The Abyss shares part of its income from publishing games to return you the part of every single payment made by your referrals. .... PROFIT!  P.S. And sometimes you get payed just for playing the game you like.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: You are absolutely right.

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: The Abyss is a Game platform where you can buy games and play games. The core innovation is a referral program that will allow you to earn from each payment made by your referrals in any game they play.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: The Abyss Aims to Conduct the World’s First DAICO, A New Protection Mechanism for ICO Contributors, Raised By Vitalik Buterin  The Abyss is a next generation digital distribution platform with the vision to create a crypto reward ecosystem for millions of gamers and developers  The Abyss, the next generation digital distribution game platform, today announced the intent to launch a pioneering DAICO, a reinforced version of ICO merged with aspects of Decentralized Autonomous Organisation (DAO). The DAICO fundraising model was proposed by Vitalik Buterin, co-founder of Ethereum, earlier this month as a more responsible way to conduct initial coin offerings.  Read more: https://coinidol.com/abyss-aims-to-conduct-world-first-daico-new-protection-mechanism-for-ico-contributors/

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Welcome to The Abyss  What is DAICO?  DAICO is an innovative fundraising model (suggested by the founder of Ethereum, Vitalik Buterin) that merges some of the benefits of Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs), aimed at upgrading and making the initial ICO concept more transparent and secure. The Abyss Token Sale is an advanced and improved DAICO model, allowing token holders to control the fund withdrawal limit, also providing an option to vote for refund of the remaining contributed money in case the team fails to implement the project, with Oracles (appointed industry leaders) acting as arbitrators. Read more here.  WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | SMARTPAPER  | ONE PAGER  | Github | Facebook | Twitter | Medium | Discord | Telegram (ENG) | Telegram (Bounty) | Bounty       www.theabyss.com  CONNECT WITH US: Telegram: https://telegram.theabyss.com Discord: https://discord.theabyss.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/theabyss Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/theabyss Medium: https://medium.com/theabyss Reddit: https://reddit.theabyss.com Vimeo: https://www.vimeo.com/theabyss Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/theabyss Github: https://github.com/theabyssportal

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Hi, all!  I’m Konstantin, the founder of Destiny.Games video game company and, above all, a gamer since late 1980s.  Today we are witnessing the rise of the video game industry. In 2017, its revenue has already exceeded $100 billion and is expected to reach almost $170 billion mark by 2020. But most notably, the market is shifting from offline to online business model providing a potential for digital innovation.  I proudly present you The Abyss - an innovative digital distribution platform, which, I truly believe, will become a next-generation Steam and revolutionize the video game industry.    What’s it all about? Three words. Games. Profit. Blockchain.  It is the first game platform in human history where both gamers and developers can profit from being a part of a brilliant referral and motivational system as well as being creative. Gamers will enjoy the best F2P browser and client MMO games (our priority at the early stage) and the developers will become partners instead of competitors. This is a brand-new approach that will change the whole video game industry.  As for blockchain. The platform will utilize ABYSS tokens (ERC20 standard on Ethereum blockchain) for payments, rewards, referral programs, etc. Fiat money will also be acceptable, but only with ABYSS tokens users will get access to all services The Abyss will offer.  I participated in numerous and various ICOs, gaining plenty of experience, and understand how to avoid all the crucial mistakes their founders have committed.  At the moment, we are working towards Token Sale and signing up partners willing to join our platform. Please find our project profile and Whitepaper above. Share our passion and get ready to embrace the future of video game industry with us!

Author: Seph1roth
Title: [ANN] [THE WORLD'S FIRST DAICO] The Abyss - The Next-Generation Game Platform
Body: Regarding The Abyss' multilevel referral program. How it works. A gamer brought in by a developer provides the developer an income from all payments in any other game on the platform. The gamer becomes the game's (= developer's) lifetime referral if it was this game that he played first after the registration on the platform. He is the first-level referral for this game (= its developer). If he brings in his friend, the latter will be the second-level referral and so on.      As for the gamers. If a gamer invites his friend to join the game on the platform, the friend becomes the gamer's first-level referral. The gamer receives income from ALL the friend's payments. Then a friend invites his friend, who is the second-level referral for the founder of the referral chain. And so on.  Also gamers receive income from various activities on the platform (achievements, content creation, internal CPA offers, etc.)  Economics. The developer gets 70% from all payments in his game and a share of payments made by his referrals in other games on the platform. The platform thus gets 30% from all payments, 1/3 of which is distributed to referral programs. The first-level referrals are rewarded with 40% of 1/3. The second- and third-level referrals receive 20% each, the forth- and the fifth-level referrals get 10% each.
